metadata.name: without hope
metadata.description:
choice, the most powerful tool we have. 
in every situation we face choices and then we'll choose what keep focusing on and how we'll feel.

without hope we can't see there is a light for us and notice the beauties. 
the hopeless person wrapped in something like snake that means null.


1/1 original handmade painting.
this idea took more than 2 months.
